item.title: dotnet: The Dongle Died at Midnight – WinForms Agent Saved my German Mom’s Business Trip
item.description:
A .NET Blog post describing how the author used a WinForms agent/AI-assisted development workflow to quickly build a replacement time-study app after a hardware dongle failed during a business trip.

  • Source: .NET

item.title: github: Dynamic Copilot prompts on GitHub Docs
item.description:
GitHub announced dynamic Copilot prompts on GitHub Docs, allowing users to launch GitHub Copilot prompts directly from select documentation pages to move seamlessly from reading docs to using Copilot.

  • Source: GitHub

item.title: github: Coming soon: Simpler pricing and a better experience for GitHub Actions
item.description:
Starting January 1, 2026, GitHub will lower prices for GitHub-hosted runners by up to 39% (varying by machine type) to deliver simpler pricing and a better GitHub Actions experience; free usage minute quotas will remain unchanged.

  • Source: GitHub

item.title: dotnet: Microsoft Learn MCP Server Elevates Development
item.description:
Microsoft’s Learn MCP server improves the Copilot developer experience by providing practical examples and clear integration steps for Visual Studio, Visual Studio Code, the Copilot CLI, and the Copilot Coding Agent.

  • Source: .NET

item.title: github: Actions workflow dispatch workflows now support 25 inputs
item.description:
GitHub Actions workflow_dispatch triggers now accept up to 25 inputs (previously 10), making manually triggered workflows easier to parameterize for more complex scenarios.

  • Source: GitHub

item.title: azure: [In preview] Public Preview: Azure Container Apps adds support for agentic Docker Compose
item.description:
Azure Container Apps is announcing a public preview that brings Docker Compose support to the service, enabling developers to use their existing docker-compose workflows to define and run multi-container applications directly on Azure Container Apps. This integration aims to simplify deployment and lower the friction for moving compose-based projects to the cloud.

  • Source: Azure Updates

item.title: github: Copilot coding agent now supports pull request templates
item.description:
GitHub’s Copilot coding agent, an autonomous background agent that creates and updates pull requests with a summary of its changes, now supports repository pull request templates so its generated PR bodies follow your repo’s template while still inserting the agent’s summary.

  • Source: GitHub

item.title: github: Copilot code review: Path-scoped custom instruction file support
item.description:
GitHub announced that Copilot code review now supports path-scoped custom instruction files, letting repositories provide targeted review guidance for specific directories or files using existing instruction files.

  • Source: GitHub
